job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: At HubSpot we use data to power our decisions systems and product solutions Were seeking an experienced data scientist to deliver that insight Our ideal team member will have the mathematical and statistical expertise youd expect but a natural curiosity and creative mind thats not so easy to find You will join a team of data specialists but will slice and dice data using your own methods creating new visions for the futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtObjectives of this RoleltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtCollaborate with product design and engineering to develop an understanding of needsltligtltligtResearch and devise innovative statistical models for data analysisltligtltligtEnable smarter business processesand implement analytics for meaningful insightsltligtltligtKeep current with technical and industry developmentsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRole ObjectivesResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWork as the lead data strategist building models to improve internal efficiency and customer experienceltligtltligtWork closely with the engineering team to strategize and execute the development of data productsltligtltligtExecute analytical experiments methodically to help solve various problems and make a true impact across various domains and industriesltligtltligtImplement analytical models into production by collaborating with software developers and machine learning engineersltligtltligtDevise and utilize algorithms and models to mine big data stores perform data and error analysis to improve models and clean and validate data for uniformity and accuracyltligtltligtIdentify relevant data sources and sets to mine for client business needs and collect large structured and unstructured datasets and variablesltligtltligtAnalyze data for trends and patterns and Interpret data with a clear objective in mindltligtltligtCommunicate analytic solutions to stakeholders and implement improvements as needed to operational systemsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtSkills And QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDegree in statistics applied mathematics or related disciplineltligtltligt5 years experience in data scienceltligtltligtProficiency with data mining mathematics and statistical analysisltligtltligtAdvanced pattern recognition and predictive modeling experienceltligtltligtAdvanced use of SQL R PythonltligtltligtExperience with machine learning modelsltligtltligtComfort working in a dynamic researchoriented group with several ongoing concurrent projectsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMasters degree in stats applied math or related disciplineltligtltligt2 years of project management experienceltligtltligtProfessional certificationsltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtWe know theltemgtltemgt confidence gapltemgtltemgt andltemgtltemgt imposter syndromeltemgtltemgt can get in the way of meeting relationship management CRM platform that provides software and support to help businesses grow better We build marketing sales service and website management products that start free and scale to Comparably Fortune Entrepreneur Inc and moreltbrgtltbrgtHeadquartered in Cambridge Massachusetts HubSpot was founded in 2006 Today thousands of employees work across the globe in HubSpot offices and
